entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
